scripts.build: ng build revolsys-angular-bcgov-page; ng build revolsys-angular-framework; ng build revolsys-angular-leaflet; ng build revolsys-angular-coordinate-system; ng build
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-framework;npm run publish-leaflet;npm run publish-coordinate-system;npm run publish-bcgov;
scripts.publish-bcgov: ng build revolsys-angular-bcgov-page --prod; npm publish dist/revolsys-angular-bcgov-page
scripts.publish-framework: ng build revolsys-angular-framework --prod; npm publish dist/revolsys-angular-framework
scripts.publish-leaflet: ng build revolsys-angular-leaflet --prod; npm publish dist/revolsys-angular-leaflet
scripts.publish-coordinate-system: ng build revolsys-angular-coordinate-system --prod; npm publish dist/revolsys-angular-coordinate-system
